kizuna_health_c_02:
Sorry, were you looking for me? I’ve been away
from the nurse’s office lately.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_03: Did you need something from me?[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_04a: Are your Pokémon hurt? Just a sec...[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_04b:
Whaaat? But then why’d you come over to talk?
Oh well, I’ll heal up your Pokémon anyway.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_05: Here ya go. A little first aid.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_06:
You must really be having an adventure out there,
judging from those scrapes and cuts![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_07:
Huh? Oh yeah, I guess it is pretty unusual for me
to be out of the nurse’s office like this.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_08: Hehe. Well...I’m actually doing a bit of studying.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_09:
Thought I’d try my best at the health teacher
certification exam one more time.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_10:
Just so you know, it’s totally NOT because I’m
inspired by a certain somebody working hard\r
at their Treasure Hunt, OK?[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_11: Well...maybe I am just a little bit![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_13: Uh-oh! My break time’s almost over![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_14:
[VAR BD06(0000)]I know you’ll be cheering me on,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_c_system_01: You feel trusted by Nurse Miriam!
